comment: This Friday will be the longest we've ever went without Laura being posted on Patreon.
Second longest was between Jan 8, 2018 and May 5, 2018.
ohi tom, didn't expect to see you here this early
why on earth are you up this early
So apparently we need a laura suggestion this week :p
Also joy.  8 hour shift tonight out of the blue because "making up hours" :ptv-unimpressed:
I felt wrecked after watching the entire stream last night
I had a dentist appointment this morning, that's why I was awake so early.
@AspiringNoodle There's usually a couple of Laura suggestions in the polls each week, but they're never voted on and Tom never picks them.
The new system is completely stacked against Laura; she's never going to get drawn again, and that breaks my heart.  At least in the old system she had a chance every now and then.
@Windows998SE Never drawn again? What's stacked against her?
Don't see how she'll ever be sketched again.  No matter what the suggestion is, she'll never get enough votes.
On the old polls, things were randomally split into four rounds and there was a different voting base.  There was always a chance she'd win, but not now.

For example, take a look at the hen house suggestion, done OKish in the Patreon vote, but still not well enough to ever come close to winning.  Yet she nearly won a few weeks ago when tkpolls was used.

Well, I feel a little frustrated too sometimes-my suggestion hasn't been doing well in the patreon polls, but the very first time I suggested it, on TKPolls, it got 2nd place in the vote. I am still holding out hope that Tom will pick it, however.
At least you still have hope of Tom picking your suggestion.  I personally don't see Tom picking Laura again after finding out he rejected Iliar's Laura Nora card.
I can't say "he rejected" this. It seems to me possible it possible to Nora Card. There are just two problems with this sketch. Which I do not know how to solve.
Yeah, you said on discord Tom "does not see how to turn this sketch into a full-fledged".
I get the impression Tom either doesn't like the character, or just doesn't care enough to put some thought into her.
Same for the human Laura sketch, which got memory holed.
just saw the last comic page. i wonder what rose is planning
this either go horribly wrong or horribly wrong
I am also tired from staying up late yesterday
well that's what you get for being european and a tk fan
i was glad i could sleep till 10
yeah it be cold in my house
make a hot cup of tea?
also does anybody know how to create a simulated umts network? i wanna try some stuff
actually good idea... i should still have some of the only tea i actully enjoy

what can you do with it?

but the problem is that phone networks are ancient technology and they have to be able to fall back to older stuff if the newer technologies fail
and the idea changes the principle of calling someone so fundamentally that it kinda has to be backwards compatible
but actually no it has not
I just know it for the Doom thing

you know how i left early on the sunday stream
yh but i felt more awake then i had ever been the next day
at least i finished my homework
its 3.10 am and i have school
Good!  Lot's of rain, kinda chilly, but I just finished working on some photos I took on my vacation
oh nice. i love the rain
i think we are supposed to get some soon. but its so hot outside
I think fall rolled in early this year
Only one day so far in September has broken 70
It is just a nice environment.
and a cat with hungry eyes
he got a crumb of a pretzel stick but that’s all he’s getting if I got anything to do with it
I wish to feed the cat
Dear Diary: Today, someone made a Little Shop of Horrors reference in chat using Maeve. No one else got it, but now I want to see a crossover between LSoH, Twokinds, and The Thing.
I wonder what that would even look like
Maeve is The Thing being kept as a pet project under the guise of an assistant in a flower shop.
Feel free to use that as a suggestion for a Sunday Sketch.
We have a new idea for your next visit to sketch purgatory
Already on it with my newest one.
Sythe giving diplomatic "advice" to the Basitin trio.
And with that, I am off to work. Cya'll later folks!
got a question to run by you
Me? I have one minute shoot.
do you want to see a picture
Sorry, I really gotta go. Will be back in an hour or so.

instead of fixing the car eventually or really it seems even trying to get to fixing it it looks like he’s gonna try selling it

It's a tiny, adorable spider that is constantly screaming in existential crisis
